title: Why is my FPS so low all of a sudden???
body: I play normally with around 300 FPS, capped at 144.  I played yesterday, and everything was normal and good. Now my FPS won't go above 15 even on very low graphics. Anyone know why this is???

replies.body: You could be having some general wear and tear like outdated drivers, overheating, or even bad game files.  I suggest going through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to start off.  If your PC is all too good, it may be worth capping your fps.  I hope that helps!
